text: Yara arasa bahana kare ebam yara tara carapase ache, tara tadera palanakartara saprasansa pabitrata barnana kare, tara prati bisbasa sthapana kare ebam muminadera jan'ye ksama prarthana kare bale, he amadera palanakarta, apanara rahamata o jnana sabakichute paribyapta. Ata'eba, yara ta'oba kare ebam apanara pathe cale, taderake ksama karuna ebam jahannamera ayaba theke raksa karuna.
